Details for Variety of Useful Books

Owner
roger
Description

A collection of selected books that range from quick-to-download to pathologically-ridiculous-go-bake-some-muffins.

More Information
Visit English Short Title Catalogue website
Status
Public

Edit

Collection Builder Detail Example

The border is defined on the sidebar element. Because the blocks have display: table-cell the sidebar is always as tall as the containing div, and the border always stretches the full height.

This page demonstrates the sidebar in mb when viewing a collection. See the results page for the HTML of a result row.

The wombat : common wombats in Australia / Barbara Triggs ; illustrated by Ross Goldingay.

by Triggs, Barbara.
Published 1988
